summary: This is a brief email correspondence forwarding a sealed court order from Judge Sarah Netburn's chambers in the Southern District of New York, related to a grand jury subpoena in case 19-mc-00179. It indicates ongoing sealed proceedings in the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Sarah Netburn
persons.context: The Honorable Judge presiding over the grand jury subpoena case 19-mc-00179; her chambers are the recipient of the correspondence.

events.title: Sealed Order Filed in Grand Jury Subpoena Case
events.description: An order was filed under seal in case 19-mc-00179, related to a grand jury subpoena.

keyFacts: A sealed order was filed on July 15, 2020, in the grand jury subpoena case 19-mc-00179.
Judge Sarah Netburn of the Southern District of New York is presiding over the case.
The correspondence indicates ongoing, non-public (sealed) legal proceedings related to the Epstein investigation as of July 2020.
